alert.note: Alert for Cascade; Lewis and Clark; Teton (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 12:58PM MDT until May 22 at 1:45PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Lewis and Clark County in west central Montana... South central Teton County in north central Montana... West central Cascade County in central Montana... * Until 145 PM MDT. * At 1257 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 19 miles northeast of Lincoln, or 35 miles west of Cascade, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cascade, Fairfield, Fort Shaw, Fort Shaw, Bowmans Corner, Bean Lake and Simms. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
